column5: Not sure if all Walmarts have the same cuts,but the boating section has some great deals and the lure section has got alot of cut priced products. I picked up 6 packs of the Shamano rod wraps for 4 bucks each (2 in a pack). 3 dollar savings. If your looking for some closed face reels for the young,ns,they got the Spirix for 5 bucks. The reel seems to be well made for what it is. As for the boating thing,the seats are marked down 20 bucks,theres pumps and fuel lines, saftey kits.
Has anyone bought the seats from Walmart? I think they are WISE, are they worth it?
Had them on my old boar for 4 years, they are worth the money.
They seem to be like the rest. If you get 4 years out of them for the price,I cant see how you can go wrong.  Clamp-it,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,Clamp-it.LOL

Any wally world's in your area with the seats having a green/grey motif.Here in Orillia it's just red/grey & blue/grey.There's still some here.As well the bushline fishing vests are marked down.Some as low as 12.49. Kerry
Rod Wraps? Did they have lure wraps? You know... The ones that probably cost less than $1 to make and they charge you $8!!
